---
category: news
title: "AI-trained embryo labeling technique boosts IVF success"
excerpt: "In vitro fertilization (IVF) is known to have a success rate of just 30 percent per cycle. Tel Aviv-based Fairtility, which uses artificial intelligence (AI) to improve that number, has been found to outperform human assessment of embryo quality as well as the existing FDA-approved system of embryo classification and selection."
